html.p: Proposition. If the linear transformation [mathjaxinline]T: \mathbb R^ n \rightarrow \mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline] has standard matrix [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline], then [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is into if and only if [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] has no free variables. It is impossible for [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] to be into if [mathjaxinline]n>m[/mathjaxinline].
